meanings.sent1: The gasketed lid kept the contents fresh.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a gasketed seal to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent3: The gasketed door made a funny noise when opened quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a gasketed lock, keeping her emotions hidden.
meanings.sent5: The gasketed window shielded the room from the cold wind.

meanings.sent1: The gasketed pipe prevented any leaks.
meanings.sent2: The jar was securely gasketed to preserve the jam.
meanings.sent3: The gasketed bottle refused to open no matter how hard he tried.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt gasketed, protected from further hurt.
meanings.sent5: The gasketed container held the precious documents safely inside.
